oware

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • oware.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board class has the logic for a text based game of Oware such as how to sow, harvest, or determine who is up.

    • Method Detail

      • getNorthHousesArray

        public int[] getNorthHousesArray()
        getNorthHousesArray gets a deep copy of the North player's houses
        Returns:
        an int array of the North players houses

      • getSouthHousesArray

        public int[] getSouthHousesArray()
        getSouthHousesArray creates a deep copy of the South player's houses
        Returns:
        an int array of the South players houses

      • getNorthScore

        public int getNorthScore()
        getNorthScore get the number in northStore
        Returns:
        an int of seeds for the North player

      • getSouthScore

        public int getSouthScore()
        getNorthScore get the number in southStore
        Returns:
        an int of seeds for the South player

      • playMove

        public boolean playMove(char player,
                        char house)
        playMove attempts to play the move indicated by the player and house parameters. If the move is invalid, then a result of false is returned.
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the move was successful

      • isValidMove

        private boolean isValidMove(char player,
                            char house)
        isValidMove determines if the move indicated by the player and house parameters is valid
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the move is valid

      • sow

        private int sow(char player,
                char house)
        sow move the seeds around the board in correspondence with the rules
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Returns:
        an index of what house the play ended in

      • harvest

        private int harvest(char player,
                    int houseIndex)
        harvest if opponents house count is 2 or 3 capture seeds
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        houseIndex - an int of what house we are in
        Returns:
        an int of the number of seeds harvested

      • getHouseIndex

        private int getHouseIndex(char player,
                          char house)
        getHouseIndex maps character representations of the player and house to an index in the houses array
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        house - a character representation of the house
        Returns:
        the index of the house in the houses array or -1 if the parameters do not indicate a valid index

      • isOnPlayerSide

        private boolean isOnPlayerSide(char player,
                               int houseIndex)
        isOnPlayerSide determine if index passed in is on players side
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        houseIndex - an int index of where we are in the houses array
        Returns:
        a bool if we are on the correct side

      • getPlayerSeeds

        private int getPlayerSeeds(char player)
        getPlayerSeeds get the number of seeds on the players side
        Parameters:
        player - a character representation of the player
        Returns:
        an int of the number of seeds a player has

      • getNextHouseIndex

        private int getNextHouseIndex(int index)
        getNextHouseIndex returns the next house in the houses array
        Parameters:
        index - the current house index in the houses array
        Returns:
        the next house index in the houses array
